item.title: Research & Education
item.description: Research Broadly speaking, I am interested in discrete mathematics, especially analytic number theory, combinatorics, and finite fields. For my PhD project, I work on arithmetic statistics of various algebraic objects with number theoretical importance. This project involves studying arithmetic statistics multivariate Diophantine equations, using techniques mostly from analytic number theory. During my bachelor and master studies, I did a total of two final projects over finite fields. However, I am open for learning other topics.

item.title: Activities
item.description: Other Mathematical Activities Mathematical Teachings University of New South Wales Class Tutor (2024-present). Course tutored including MATH1081 Discrete Mathematics, MATH1131 Mathematics 1A, MATH1141 Higher Mathematics 1A, MATH1231 Mathematics 1B M,ATH1241 Higher Mathematics 1B and MATH1251 Mathematics for Actuarial Studies and Finance 1B. Drop-in Centre Tutor (2023-present) Exams Invigilator (2022-present) Exams & Assignments Marker (2022-present) Institut Teknologi Bandung Drop-in Centre Tutor (2019-2022) Exams Invigilator (2018-2022) Exams & Assignments Marker (2018-2022) Mathematical Olympiad Observer B for Indonesia at International Mathematical Olympiad 2025, Sunshine Coast, Australia.

item.title: Other Works
item.description: Special Sessions I gave three separate sessions in Institut Teknologi Bandung (December 2024), Universitas Diponegoro (January 2025), and Universitas Gadjah Mada (February 2025) on preparations for studying graduate mathematics overseas, especially for mathematical research. Tl;dr please do mathematics overseas. The slides are available in Bahasa Indonesia. Mettamatika Project Mettamatika Project comes from Spearhead Circle, a pop-culture collective based in Indonesia, with backbones from my friends in ITB. The main mission of this project is to produce books that blend mathematical contents with pop culture references.

item.title: Links & Musings
item.description: Yui Funami, YuruYuri. This was the frontpage picture for a long time, and when I changed the picture, my friend told me to let Yui stay here. Other links Here are my English and Indonesian blogs (which are infrequently updated). During the pandemic, I often crash into some online mathematical research seminars from Research Seminars webpage. In fact, I first knew my doctoral advisor from the Number Theory Web Seminar she organizes.
